resources.string: Image is too large to preview, but saving will be tried anyway
Do you really want to close the app\?
Image changes will roll back to initial values
All image EXIF data will be erased. This action cannot be undone!
All unsaved changes will be lost, if you exit now
Get the latest updates, discuss issues and more
Change specs of single given image
Pick color from image, copy or share
Generate color palette swatch from given image
Cannot generate palette for given image
Resize an image following given size in KB
If enabled, when you choose an image to edit, app colors will be adopted to this image
If enabled surfaces color will be set to absolute dark in night mode
Cannot change app color scheme while dynamic colors are turned on
App theme will be based on selected color
Send bug reports and feature requests here
Correct translation mistakes or localize project to another languages
If enabled, then app colors will be adopted to wallpaper colors
App needs access to your storage to save images to work, it is necessary. Please grant permission in the next dialog box.
App needs this permission to work, please grant it manually
This application is completely free, but if you want to support the project development, you can click here
If enabled, update dialog will be shown to you on app startup
Select which emoji to display on the main screen
If enabled, adds width and height of saved image to the name of output file
Delete EXIF metadata from any set of images
Preview any type of images: GIF, SVG, and so on
Android modern photo picker which appears at the bottom of the screen, may work only on android 12+. Has issues receiving EXIF metadata
Simple gallery image picker. It will work only if you have an app that provides media picking
Use GetContent intent to pick image. Works everywhere, but is known to have issues receiving picked images on some devices. That\'s not my fault.
Determines order of the options on the main screen
If enabled adds original filename in the name of the output image
If enabled replaces standard timestamp to the image sequence number if you use batch processing
Adding original filename doesn\'t work if photo picker image source selected
Load any image from the internet to preview, zoom, edit and save it if you want.
Forces every picture into an image given by the Width and Height parameter - may change aspect ratio
Resizes pictures to images with a long side given by the Width or Height parameter, all size calculations will be done after saving - keeps aspect ratio
Apply any filter chain to given images
Resize selected images to follow given width and height limits whilst saving aspect ratio
You disabled Files app, activate it to use this feature
Draw on image like in a sketchbook, or draw on the background itself
Pick an image and draw something on it
Pick background color and draw on top of it
Encrypt and Decrypt any file (not only the image) based on AES crypto algorythm
Store this file on your device or use share action to put it wherever you want
Password-based encryption of files. Proceeded files can be stored in the selected directory or shared. Decrypted files can also be opened directly.
AES-256, GCM mode, no padding, 12 bytes random IVs. Keys are used as SHA-3 hashes (256 bits).
The maximum file size is restricted by the Android OS and available memory, which is device dependent. \nPlease note: memory is not storage.
Please note that compatibility to other file encryption software or services is not guaranteed. A slightly different key treatment or cipher configuration may cause incompatibility.
Invalid password or chosen file is not encrypted
Trying to save image with given width and height might cause an OOM error. Do this at your own risk, and don\'t say I didn\'t warn you!
If enabled app cache will be cleared on app startup
Groups options on the main screen by their type instead of a custom list arrangement
Cannot change arrangement while option grouping is enabled
Saving in %1$s mode can be unstable, because it is a lossless format
If you have selected preset 125, image will be saved as 125% size of the original image with 100% quality. If you choose preset 50, then image will be saved with 50% size and 50% quality.
Preset here determines % of output file, i.e. if you select preset 50 on 5mb image then you will get 2.5mb image after saving
If enabled output filename will be fully random
Discuss the app and get feedback from other users. You can also get beta updates and insights here.
Use this mask type to create mask from given image, notice that it SHOULD have alpha channel
Backup your app settings to a file
Restore app settings from previously generated file
Corrupted file or not a backup
This will roll back your settings to the default values. Notice that this can\'t be undone without a backup file mentionned above.
You are about to delete selected color scheme. This operation cannot be undone
Using large font scales may cause UI glitches and problems, which won\'t be fixed. Use cautiously.
Aa Bb Cc Dd Ee Ff Gg Hh Ii Jj Kk Ll Mm Nn Oo Pp Qq Rr Ss Tt Uu Vv Ww Xx Yy Zz 0123456789 !?
Remove background from image by drawing or use Auto option
Original image metadata will be kept
Trasparent spaces around image will be trimmed
Ooopsâ€¦ Something went wrong. You can write to me using options below and i\'ll try to find solution
Change size of given images or convert them to other formats. EXIF metadata can also be edited here if picking a single image.
This allows app to collect crash reports manually
Allow collecting anonymous app usage statistics

JXL format not officially supported by android so something might not work. Saving will work only if you choose custom output directory. This is an experimental version, bugs here will not be fixed unless google adds JXL support. This version can view JXL images
Currently, %1$s format only allows reading EXIF metadata on android. Output image won\'t have metadata at all, when saved.
A value of %1$d means a fast compression, resulting in a relatively large file size. %2$d means a slower compression, resulting in a smaller file.
Saving almost complete. Cancelling now will require saving again.
Update checking will include beta app versions if enabled
If enabled drawing path will be represented as pointing arrow
Pictures will be center cropped to entered size. Canvas will be expanded with given background color if image is smaller than entered dimensions.
Combine the given images to get one big one
Small images will be scaled to the largest one in the sequence if enabled
Draws blurred edges under original image to fill spaces around it instead of single color if enabled
If enabled in drawing mode, screen won\'t rotate
Default palette style, it allows to customize all four colors, others allow you to set only the key color
A style that\'s slightly more chromatic than monochrome
A loud theme, colorfulness is maximum for Primary palette, increased for others
A playful theme - the source color\'s hue does not appear in the theme
A monochrome theme, colors are purely black / white / gray
A scheme that places the source color in Scheme.primaryContainer
A scheme that is very similar to the content scheme
This update checker will connect to GitHub in reason of checking if there is a new update available
Replaces theme colors to negative ones if enabled
Enables ability to search through all available options on the main screen
Operate with PDF files: Preview, Convert to batch of images or create one from given pictures
Convert PDF to Images in given output format
Pack given Images into output PDF file
Apply filter chains on given masked areas, each mask area can determine it\'s own set of filters
Drawn filter mask will be rendered to show you the approximate result
If enabled all of the non masked areas will be filtered instead of default behavior
You are about to delete selected filter mask. This operation cannot be undone
Apply any filter chains to given images or single image
Add some glowing effect to your drawings
Default one, simplest - just the color
Blurs image under the drawn path to secure anything you want to hide
Similar to privacy blur, but pixelates instead of bluring
Enables shadow drawing behind floating action buttons
Enables shadow drawing behind default buttons
Enables shadow drawing behind app bars
Allows limit box to be adopted for image orientation
Draws path from start point to end point as a line
Draws pointing arrow from start point to end point as a line
Draws pointing arrow from a given path
Draws double pointing arrow from start point to end point as a line
Draws double pointing arrow from a given path
Draws rect from start point to end point
Draws oval from start point to end point
Draws outlined oval from start point to end point
Draws outlined rect from start point to end point
Draws closed filled path by given path
No \"%1$s\" directory found, we switched it to default one, please save the file again
Automatically adds saved image to clipboard if enabled
In order to overwrite files you need to use \"Explorer\" image source, try repick images, we\'ve changed image source to the needed one
Original file will be replaced with new one instead of saving in selected folder, this option need to image source be \"Explorer\" or GetContent, when toggling this, it will be set automatically
Linear (or bilinear, in two dimensions) interpolation is typically good for changing the size of an image, but causes some undesirable softening of details and can still be somewhat jagged
Better scaling methods include Lanczos resampling and Mitchell-Netravali filters
One of the simpler ways of increasing the size, replacing every pixel with a number of pixels of the same color
Simplest android scaling mode that used in almost all apps
Method for smoothly interpolating and resampling a set of control points, commonly used in computer graphics to create smooth curves
Windowing function often applied in signal processing to minimize spectral leakage and improve the accuracy of frequency analysis by tapering the edges of a signal
Mathematical interpolation technique that uses the values and derivatives at the endpoints of a curve segment to generate a smooth and continuous curve
Resampling method that maintains high-quality interpolation by applying a weighted sinc function to the pixel values
Resampling method that use a convolution filter with adjustable parameters to achieve a balance between sharpness and anti-aliasing in the scaled image
Utilizes piecewise-defined polynomial functions to smoothly interpolate and approximate a curve or surface, flexible and continuous shape representation
Saving to storage will not be performed, and image will be tried to put into the clipboard only
Brush will restore background instead of erasing
Recognize text from given image, 120+ languages supported
Picture has no text, or app didn\'t find it
For proper functioning of Tesseract OCR additional training data (%1$s) needs to be downloaded to your device.\nDo you want to download %2$s data?
No connection, check it and try again in order to download train models
Pixel-like switch will be used instead of google\'s material you based one
Overwritten file with name %s at original destination
Enables magnifier at the top of finger in drawing modes for better accessibility
Forces exif widget to be checked initially
This app is completely free, if you want it to become bigger, please star the project on Github ðŸ˜„
Do you want to delete language \"%1$s\" OCR training data for all recognition types, or only for selected one (%2$s)?
Create gradient of given output size with customized colors and appearance type
Compose any gradient of top of given image
Uses camera to take picture, note that it is possible to get only one image from this image source
Cover pictures with customizable text/image watermarks
Repeats watermark over image instead of single at given position
This image will be used as pattern for watermarking
Convert images to GIF picture or extract frames from given GIF image
Convert GIF file to batch of pictures
Convert batch of images to GIF file
Replace specified size with first frame dimensions
Uses Lasso like in drawing mode to perform erasing
Confetti will be shown on saving, sharing and other primary actions
Hides content on exit, also the screen can\'t be captured or recorded
If you leave preview now, you\'ll need to add the images again
Utilizes piecewise-defined bicubic polynomial functions to smoothly interpolate and approximate a curve or surface, flexible and continuous shape representation
App bar emoji will be continuously changed by random instead of using selected one
Can\'t use random emoji picking while emojis disabled
Can\'t select an emoji while picking random one enabled
Adds container with selected shape under the leading icons of cards
Cannot change image format while overwrite files option enabled
Uses emoji primary color as app color scheme instead of manually defined one
Creates Material You palette from image
Uses night mode color scheme instead of light variant
Convert images to APNG picture or extract frames from given APNG image
Convert APNG file to batch of pictures
Convert batch of images to APNG file
Create Zip file from given files or images
Perform JXL ~ JPEG transcoding with no quality loss, or convert GIF/APNG to JXL animation
Perform lossless transcoding from JXL to JPEG
Perform lossless transcoding from JPEG to JXL
Allows app to auto paste clipboard data, so it will appear on main screen and you will be able to process it
Resampling method that maintains high-quality interpolation by applying a Bessel (jinc) function to the pixel values
Convert GIF images to JXL animated pictures
Convert APNG images to JXL animated pictures
Convert JXL animation to batch of pictures
Convert batch of pictures to JXL animation
File picker will be shown immediately if this possible on chosen screen
Enables preview generation, this may help to avoid crashes on some devices, this also disables some editing functionality within single edit option
Uses lossy compression to reduce file size instead of lossless
Controls resulting image decoding speed, this should help open resulting image faster, value of %1$d means slowest decoding, whereas %2$d - fastest, this setting may increase output image size
Uses Image Toolbox own image picker instead of system predefined ones
If this disabled then in landscape mode settings will be opened on the button in top app bar as always, instead of permanent visible option
Enable it and settings page will be always opened as fullscreen instead of slideable drawer sheet
Uses Jetpack Compose material you switch, it\'s not so beautiful as view based
Uses View based material you switch, this one looks greater than others and have nice animations
Uses Windows 11 styled switch based on \"Fluent\" design system
Uses IOS like switch based on cupertino design system
Trace given images to SVG images
Quantization palette will be sampled if this option enabled
Usage of this tool for tracing large images without downscaling are not recommended, it can cause crash and increase processing time
Image will be downscaled to lower dimensions before processing, this helps tool to work faster and safer
All properties will be set to default values, notice that this action cannot be undone
Convert image batches to given format
Draw Text on path with given font and color
Current text will be repeated until the path end instead of one time drawing
Use selected image to draw it along given path
This image will be used as repetitive entry of drawn path
Draws outlined triangle from start point to end point
Draws outlined triangle from start point to end point
Draws polygon from start point to end point
Draws outlined polygon from start point to end point
Draw polygon which will be regular instead of free form
Draws star from start point to end point
Draws outlined star from start point to end point
Draw star which will be regular instead of free form
Enables antialiasing to prevent sharp edges
When you select image to open (preview) in ImageToolbox, edit selection sheet will be opened instead of previewing
Scan documents and create PDF or separate images from them
Options below is for saving images, not PDF
Enables Text Field behind presets selection, to enter them on the fly
Scanned QR Code isn\'t a valid filter template
Selected file have no filter template data
This image will be used to preview this filter template
